Our famous, flaky biscuits. Our freshly baked, warm, flaky, buttermilk biscuits have become one of the most popular items on the KFC menu. One taste & you'll know why.

Tender, crispy chicken strips. These are the chicken strips you'd expect from the chicken experts. Every strip is made from juicy, 100% premium all-white meat chicken breast, marinated & double-breaded in our special seasonings. They taste good enough to eat on their own or dip them in one of our flavorful sauces.

Better-for-you option w/ the savory flavor of KFC. Kentucky grilled chicken starts w/ chicken that is marinated & delivered fresh to KFC restaurants, then seasoned & slow-grilled to juicy perfection. The cooking process includes a savory blend of spices that is KFC's newest secret recipe & utilizes custom-designed, patented grilling ovens, for mouthwatering, fall-off-the-bone taste.
Whipped to perfection. Our signature whipped mashed potatoes topped w/ delicious brown home- style gravy. They go together like the colonel & KFC.

Freshly‎ prepared & delicious. We take shredded cabbage, diced carrots, & just a sprinkle of onions & mix them all in a delicious dressing for what a lot of folks consider to be the world's best cole slaw.

So crunchy, it's loud. This is chicken for anyone who believes that the crunchier & crispier chicken is, the better. In other words, this is fried chicken-lover's fried chicken. KFC extra crispy starts w/ chicken delivered fresh. then It's prepared fresh w/ a painstaking double hand breading process by real cooks & fried to crispy golden perfection. Every bite is a bite of tender, juicy chicken w/ a flaky, crunchy coating that lives up to its name.

Colonel's secret recipe. This is it - one of the world's most delicious secrets. Colonel sanders created the perfect blend of 11 herbs & spices in corbin kentucky more than 70 years ago, & it's that same secret recipe that's loved all over the world today. The irresistible taste of original recipe starts w/ chicken delivered fresh from trusted suppliers like tyson. Then it's made fresh, seasoned w/ the 11 herbs & spices & hand breaded throughout the day by a certified cook.

Juicy bone-in wings. Our meaty chicken wings are marinated in chili peppers & spices on the inside, keeping the outside crispy, crunchy & sauce-less. So the difference isn't what's on the wing, it's what's in the wing. Every bite starts crunchy & finishes spicy. Pick some up for the party, the big game, or just to spice up lunch or dinner.
Get big spice for a little price with five pieces of crispy, all white-meat chicken. They're a mouth-watering treat with three different kinds of peppers and savory spices.

A tasty way to get your veggies. Piping-hot baked potato straight from the oven topped with tender pieces of broccoli and a creamy cheese sauce. Stands alone or goes with any sandwich. Available at select restaurants.
We only use the best, real ingredients like 100% cocoa, fresh milk and rich cream.

Menu.Item: Shrimp Scampi   rice pilaf and seasonal vegetables
Menu.Description: According to the Encyclopedia of American Food and Drink, Scampi is a Venetian term, dating in English print to 1920.  What is Scampi?  The answers vary, but most fall into two categories; a type of shrimp or a preparation of shrimp. The earliest reference to Shrimp Scampi in the New York Times is a restaurant advertisement published in 1956 for the Tenakill Restaurant in Englewood, N.J. There are many variations of Shrimp Scampi.  Our version consists of five Jumbo Shrimp sautéed in butter with fresh garlic, lemon juice, white wine and chopped parsley.

consultation services consist of a complete walk-thru and assessment of the home, compiling a list of recommendations that can be completed for staging the home for maximum profit. two hour maximum.
we​ will revitalize your living space by rearranging existing furniture, accessories and artwork.

we are well versed in mixing styles, sourcing unique products, and working with existing pieces to create distinctive and intriguing interiors. our team has managed a variety of projects - large, small, contemporary and traditional, with a focus towards transitional design. our experience, education and enthusiasm for interior design motivates us to create harmonious and beautiful spaces our clients will enjoy for a lifetime.
are you stumped with how to arrange furniture or maximize your small space? This is where we come in.
we will go room by room arranging pre-existing furniture, artwork and accessories to create a fresh new look .  four hour maximum
we will create a proposal to design needed areas and add enough home furnishings in order to give the space a warm, open and comfortable feel.

Our fish fry is best dining in. It is made fresh to order, but when packaged the steam tends to "soften"the fish. We try to make it so it is ready right at the promised time of 20 minutes, but still come in a few minutes early, then you are assured of the best possible product! I promise if you have to wait a short time it will be worth it, or better yet, order it here & have a refreshing beverage while you wait!

Onion flavor throughout! It's so onion, it'll bring tears to your eyes!
Romano is sharper than parmesan with a bold more assertive taste. Grate it on any dish to bring out the flavors, along with a dark red wine such as cabernet, merlot, or chianti.
Simply delicious! If your looking for something a little different that your ordinary parmesan give this a try! It's like a little piece of heaven!
A garlic lovers dream! Wonderful on any hard crust bread or whole grain cracker.

A yellow, full cream brick cheese tangy with a touch of nuttiness. Brick is a wisconsin original. Medium brick is a full cream brick, also known as wunderbar. Very mild and creamy with a bit of a tang!

Buy 4, get 2 free! Mmmmm! There's nothing like homemade fudge! You've been asking for it, so here it is! And better yet, we make it ourselves. Sold by the 1/4 pound each. Select 6 pieces for discount to apply.
The sweet-smoked taste of buffalo wings right in your cheese, what could possibly be better?
Just the right combination of smoke and butter for that fabulously mild and creamy flavor of swiss.

One of our biggest sellers, the six pack is packed with a 9-oz old wisconsin summer sausage, 1/2 pound each of muenster, colby, mild cheddar, co-jack, swiss and our most popular cheese, mouse house jack. Create a taste sensation with the six pack.

Spice up our mild cheddar for a creamy taste with a bite. Horseradish and mild cheddar team up to create a mild, yet spicy sensation! Also, try our horseradish cheese spread! It's our 1 selling spread!

Traditionally made with cow's milk, monterey jack is very similar to colby. This unique blend is made with goat's milk, giving it a very distinguished flavor. Monterey jack is great for making dips or adding to spicy dishes. 8oz
Finely aged white cheddar cheese blended with cracked black peppercorn. This cave age type cheddar has won U.S. and world cheese competition awards
asiago is a hard, Italian style cheese. firm and buttery.
A 1 pound summer sausage, 8-oz mild cheddar, 7-oz gouda wheel and 1 pound of mouse house jack combines to create a bountiful gift for that special someone.
Our house recipe mouse house jack with a kick! We've added jalapeno and habanero peppers.
3.0 ounces of sticks of butter almond toffee smothered in rich milk chocolate in every box.
This sausage is sweeter than our grand champion sausage, and goes great with crackers and cheese. A perfect appetizer or meal, 18 oz.
Full, intense earthy flavor. Creamy. Try on a white sauce pizza with pine nuts, sun dried tomatoes and fresh peppers. Flavorful!

tomatoes, fresh basil and mild cheddar. this combination of fresh tomatoes, basil, and mild cheddar give that garden fresh flavor to your favorite cheddar. great in salads! try melting it under a broiler on top of Italian or French bread.

Muenster was one of the first semi-soft cheeses to be produced in wisconsin. It has a firm texture, mild flavor, and is a wonderful addition to fruit and whole grain bread appetizer dishes, along with your favorite sausage.
Forgot the bacon? No problem. Just melt this on your eggs or toast. Did someone say, "pass the toast, please? "

You won't find a more delicious blue cheese. This award-winning cheese has already received wide-spread acclaim from several leading retail specialists and chefs, for it's creaminess and evenly distributed blue veins. This cheese deserves to have a place in your refrigerator (your cheese section or on your menu. ) With pricing that is competitive with other blues, buttermilk blue offers great value for your dollar.
1 lb. Liquid honey, plastic jarour 1lb plastic jars feature our raw and unprocessed, all-natural flavors.
Juusto is a buttery-flavored, flat and squeaky cheese made in scandanavia for over 200 years - called "juustoleipa" or "ostbrod", meaning "bread cheese".
This sausage is slightly sweet and full of garlic flavor!18 oz.

Packed in an attractive cow design gift box, the family box is a real winner. Your friends and family will receive one piece each of mouse house jack, mild cheddar and co-jack cheese, plus one piece of old wisconsin summer sausage. Great for holidays and family reunions!
Mild cheddar with maple syrup marbled around the curd! Try this - a breakfast sandwich with and english muffin, egg, sausage patty and a slice of maple cheddar!
This excellent table cheese slices, shreds and melts well. Creamy, firm, elastic texture that is loved by the whole family.

That's right! Cheese that literally tastes like chicken soup! Featured on tv's famous food network by the dean boys. This creamy monterey jack has the full flovor of a bowl of chicken soup!

Our very own recipe! Developed by tony's dad, art, when he owned the store. This natural, creamy cheese is a prize of mouse house cheese haus. It is the choice topping for mexican dishes as well as an appetizer along with a belgian-style ale. Try it!

Menu.Item: Extra Sharp Cheddar, Aged Over 2 Years
Menu.Description: Every year that cheddar ages, the sharper and more crumbly it becomes. Beefy.

United states cheese championship - 1st place! Wiped with a limburger culture, aged brick (aka beer kase or stinky brick) is pungent and slightly nutty. Aged brick is well we'll just say it has a strong, tangy flavor and very pungent aroma. Brick cheese with a layer of limburger culture wiped on the outside then aged for 3-6 months.
Juusto is a buttery-flavored, flat and squeaky cheese made in scandanavia for over 200 years - called "juustoleipa" or "ostbrod", meaning "bread cheese".
People will go nuts over cheese n caraway on crackers. Creative! That distinct caraway flavor blended w/creamy swiss.

Our own version of this delightful cake. Three layers of yellow cake with almond flavored pastry cream between each layer. Whipped cream icing and toasted slivered almonds are then dusted with sweet confectioner's sugar! Our #1 seller

Available year round, order by the dozen or half dozen only. Choose from chocolate strawberries, hand dipped, dark or white chocolate, lemon (curd) tarts topped with whipped cream dollops, pecan diamonds, chocolate pate brownie squares, and cream puffs.

Fudge layered between each layer of yellow cake, smothered with our creamy chocolate butter cream icing, the spider-web effect of chocolate ganache and white chocolate on top lends this cake its name. A must try dessert!

Three layers of chocolate cake filled with silky smooth chocolate mousse, iced with a thin layer of rich chocolate butter cream, and poured with a dark chocolate ganache. Ultimate party cake. Available by order only - 10" round only
Cherry amaretto flavored cheesecake in a chocolate cookie crust, topped with cherries, whipped cream and drizzled chocolate
Smooth and creamy chocolate cheesecake in a chocolate cookie crust, topped with rich chocolate ganache, whipped cream border and ghirardelli chocolate chips. Chocoholic delight
Made​ with sour cream custard, these deep dish tarts are brimming with fruit. Very light and creamy. Choose peaches n cream, sour cherry n cream, or triple berry n cream. (Serves 12-14)
Moist​ red velvet cake with real cream cheese icing nestled between the layers and iced with cream cheese icing

Sliced luscious fresh american strawberries on a thin bed of vanilla pastry cream between three layers of our moist yellow cake. Iced with fluffy light whipped cream icing, toasted almonds around the side, and a crown of fresh glazed strawberries around the top

Three layers of yellow cake brushed with espresso, with our own homemade tiramisu filing rich in mascarpone and rum flavoring, nestled between each layer. Iced with real whipped cream and dusted with cocoa powder and chocolate covered espresso beans

Chocolate decadence in a wedge. A completely flourless cake consisting of a pound of chocolate and 1/2 pound of butter in each cake! Real whipped cream border and chocolate covered coffee beans garnish this rich dessert. Available only in large only
Southern pecans are baked into the top of this vanilla cheesecake, and then we drizzle buttery caramel and chocolate over the top for a beautiful presentation. Graham cracker crust

Three layers of yellow cake, seedless tart raspberry filling and our creamy vanilla butter cream icing, garnished with a crown of fresh raspberries and slivered toasted almonds garnish the sides. This cake is also available in chocolate

Order by the dozen or half dozen made fresh and from scratch. Choose from mini ladylocks, nut kolachi, raspberry kolachi, apricot kolachi, chocolate chip, oatmeal raisin, peanut butter, macadamia nut and white chocolate chip, m&m, sugar with sprinkles, and thumbprints (iced in your choice of colors or fudge).
Creamy coffee flavored cheesecake in a biscotti crust and topped with a pool of dark chocolate ganache, whipped cream border and chocolate covered espresso beans

Sumptuous homemade coconut custard is layered between moist yellow cakes covered with whipped cream icing and then smothered with toasted coconut! If you like coconut cream pie, you will fall in love with this cake
Golden​ sweet peaches with just a hint of almond, spooned over a rich layer of buttery caramel with chopped southern pecans and topped with golden sugar/cinnamon streusel(serves 12-14)
Silky smooth chocolate mousse spooned into a chocolate cookie crust, then topped with mounds of whipped cream and chocolate shavings
Ghirardelli chocolate chips are sprinkled throughout this creamy delight. Topped with whipped cream and chocolate chips and sitting in a traditional graham cracker crust
Rich cinnamon almond crust is latticed over a magnificent raspberry filling. Glazed to a high glass finish with slivered almonds, authentic european dessert.
Rich​ chocolate swirls through this original flavor cheesecake garnished with whipped cream border and a drizzle of chocolate. Graham cracker crust
Moist​ spice cake loaded with black walnuts and carrots. Smothered in our creamy rich homemade cream cheese icing
Tart florida key lime flavors this highly popular cheesecake which is now topped with our own lime curd topping. Graham cracker crust and whipped cream dollops
Our original cheesecake with melted white chocolate blended through it, very rich and satisfying sits atop a slice of yellow cake crust
A wonderful variety of miniature pastry and miniature cookies (ladylocks, nut, apricot, raspberry kolachi and nut tassy) all on a tray with a covered lid.

All 10" deep dish cream pies are prepared using home-made custard mounded with real whipped cream on top. Choose banana cream, chocolate-banana cream, chocolate cream, coconut cream, key lime pie, or lemon meringue. (Serves 8-10)
Baked to a golden delicious color, very light and flavorful. Great for brunches. Very european
Death by chocolate, raspberry, lemon cloud, burnt almond, buckeye, decorated cupcakes (roses, characters, wedding, steeler, penguin, or pirates).
Made with fresh hand ground nuts in a deep dish tart shell these tarts have a great shelf life and require no refrigeration! Choose chocolate hazelnut, chocolate pecan, or pecan. (Serves 12-14)

Our own homemade deep dish pie, filled to the brim with 3 pounds of your favorite fruit and topped with our own cinnamon/sugar streusel. Choose apple, apple-cranberry, apple-raisin, blueberry, cherry, peach, peach-raspberry, or triple-berry. (Serves 12-14)

Our #1 selling chocolate cake richly satisfying to all chocoholics! Three layers of devils food cake with fudge nestled between each layer, smothered in chocolate butter cream icing, ghirardelli chocolate chips covers the sides and a pool of dark chocolate ganache on top
Rich devils food cake with tart cherry filling between each layer. Iced with our real whipped cream and garnished with hand dipped chocolate covered long stemmed maraschino cherries!

All 10" deep dish fruit pies are prepared using only the highest quality fruit. Crust our own homemade recipe and can pass for your own! Choose apple, apple-raisin, blackberry, blueberry, cherry, peach, peach-raspberry, pecan, rum-raisin, strawberry-rhubarb, sugar free apple, or sugar free peach. (Serves 8-10)
For the purist, or can be topped with your choice of blueberry, cherry, or strawberry topping. Graham cracker crust
Our own homemade lemon curd nestles between each layer of light and airy yellow cake. Whipped cream icing and shredded coconut with a pool of lemon curd on top, this cake is a favorite year round
Our white chocolate cheesecake with swirls for wild raspberry throughout. Topped with whipped cream border - our #1 selling cheesecake
Smooth chocolate and peanut butter in a chocolate cookie crust, bordered with real whipped cream. Peanut butter cups never tasted so good
Oreo cookies are blended throughout this creamy vanilla cheesecake, sitting in an oreo cookie crust, topped with dollops of whipped cream and oreo cookie crumbs

Three luscious layers of rich chocolate devils food cake with our own homemade peanut butter filling nestled between. Iced with creamy chocolate buttercream icing and topped with dollops of chocolate butter cream and crushed peanuts! Deeee-lish

Menu.Item: Beautiful Unique or Traditional Wedding Cakes
Menu.Description: Priory Fine Pastries is Pittsburgh’s favorite bakery for beautiful, unique wedding cakes! We take special care with your cake and consult with you to make sure you receive the perfect cake on your special day. Because each cake is given this individual attention, we limit the number of cakes we do each weekend and recommend that you book your date as soon as possible. We are happy to schedule a tasting as we work on the design with you. We require a non-refundable deposit on each cake when the order is accepted. Please call 412.321.7270 to speak with one of our skilled bakers or cake decorators.

Priory fine pastries has everything to fulfill your holiday dessert needs. We create the best and most delicious treats for new years, valentine’s day, mardi gras, st. patrick’s day, easter, cinco de mayo, mother’s day, father’s day, 4th of july, halloween, thanksgiving, or christmas or any other holiday!
Cookies Whether its just a regular day and you need your sweet fix or you’re planning a huge get together for the entire family, we can fulfill all of your cookie needs.

Menu.Description: Take a look at some of our previous work!

Menu.Item: A small cake baked in a cup-shaped container. Would that it were that simple. But cupcakes are so much more than that. Close your eyes for a moment and engage in a culinary past-life regression. Imagine the moist, crumby sweetness of your first, simple cupcake, the finger-lickin’ goodness of that first magical morsel of yellow, white or chocolate cake with chocolate or vanilla icing.
Menu.Description: One resident, Ed Graf, who also owns the Priory and the Grand Hall with his wife and son, is working to bring a new bakery to East Ohio Street. Having bought a building and hired a chef, he hopes to open a bakery

No matter what the occasion, priory fine pastries has delicious cakes for any party! Birthday, anniversary, graduation, retirement, shower and so many more – we will work with you to create the best and most delicious cake for your event!
